welcome_sheet.title: Welcome to Safesweat!
welcome_sheet.description: We have prepared a list of recommendaded exercise for you in the home screen based on your workout profile. Click on one of the exercises to get started.

online_exercise.error: Error getting data! Please try again. You can still access workout you saved.
Error getting data! Please try again. You can still access workout you saved.

health_problem_sheet.title: Oops
health_problem_sheet.description: We have detected health problems in your profile, it is recommended to continue with a workout plan of beginner difficulty with a lower intensity.

low_intensity_sheet.title: Great Progress!
low_intensity_sheet.description: The workout multiplier has been raised to a value that is more suitable for your current fitness level.

high_intensity_sheet.title: Adjust Intensity
high_intensity_sheet.description: This workout might not be suitable for your current fitness level, you may choose to continue with an adjusted intensity or choose a different workout.
